about_the_game:
THEY SPEAK FROM THE ABYSS is a twisted homage to classic dungeon crawling RPGs. Explore beautifully gruesome environments, solve sinister puzzles, and confront the woeful souls and frightening demons lurking throughout the Abyss.



Step into the shoes of Vanessa Rivera, a young woman who feels lost in her life. After moving to a new city to be closer to her partner, a feeling of dread overwhelms her. Is this a fresh beginning, or the start of something more terrible beyond imagination?



Delve into the Abyss and confront terrifying demons, twisted manifestations, and malevolent devils. Choose your words carefully, as some inhabitants can be reasoned with. But when talking isn’t an option, be ready to engage in heart pounding active-time battles. Practice haste, as blood thirsty beings tend to grow impatient and attack before you’ve made a decision. After all, your flesh is precious…



THEY SPEAK is about overcoming fears and trauma, and trying to become a stronger person. Players must explore and confront many personal, mature, and often dark themes; themes of body horror and psychological struggle emerged through an expression of hate and anger. The journey of the player is designed to reflect real-world trials and tribulations.

Key Features:
  • Twisted homage to classic dungeon crawlers
  • Heart pounding active-time battles
  • Horrific hand-crafted pixel art
  • Grounded psychological horror narrative experience
  • Demonic creatures inspired by Clive Barker and Junji Ito
  • Sinister puzzles to solve throughout the Abyss
  • Literal nightmares

content_descriptors.notes:
This game centers around body horror, most of the world of the Abyss is composed of human body parts and viscera. Several demons and characters are naked but nothing explicit is shown. 
Transphobia, depression, grief, and religious abuse are themes discussed in the game.

short_description: Lost in a cursed world. Surrounded by the tortured souls of the damned. Is the only way out truly a baptism in blood? Face demons head-on, talking or fighting your way through this surreal, psychological horror, dungeon crawling RPG.
